title: Great icosicosidodecahedron
summary: In geometry, the great icosicosidodecahedron (or great icosified icosidodecahedron)  is a nonconvex uniform polyhedron, indexed as U48. It has 52 faces (20 triangles, 12 pentagrams, and 20 hexagons), 120 edges, and 60 vertices.[1] Its vertex figure is a crossed quadrilateral.
